threads.title: Best local hiking trails?
threads.bodyMarkdown: Hey everyone! We're new to the area and looking for good hiking trails within 30 minutes of the cabins. Any favorites you'd recommend for a moderate skill level?

threads.title: Recommendations for local restaurants
threads.bodyMarkdown: Looking for dinner recommendations! We've been cooking at the cabin but want to try some local spots. What are your favorites?

threads.title: Welcome to Grace Springs Cabins!
threads.bodyMarkdown:
Welcome to our community! üè°

This board is here for neighbors to connect, share recommendations, and help each other out. Feel free to ask questions, share discoveries, or organize get-togethers.

Remember to be respectful and keep discussions constructive. For maintenance issues, please use the Maintenance section to submit tickets.

Enjoy your stay!

replies.bodyMarkdown: Check out Cedar Bluff Loop! It's about 20 minutes away and has beautiful views. Moderate difficulty, takes about 2 hours.
Also recommend Whispering Pines Trail. Very scenic and well-maintained. Great for families!
Mountain View Diner has amazing breakfast. Their biscuits and gravy are incredible!
For dinner, try Creek Side Steakhouse. A bit pricey but worth it for a special occasion. Make reservations on weekends!
